exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameRole" width="398" height="398" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
    <e:Image id="image" width="100%" height="100%" source="biaoqing@2x_png" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameRole" width="398" height="398" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button label="" width=""> 
        <e:Skin states="up,over,down,disabled"> 
            <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="biaoqing_jiaqi@2x_png"/>
        </e:Skin> 
    </e:Button> 
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="countDown" width="250" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="test1">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{image}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object width="{500}" height="{240}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="1000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object width="{0}" height="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{img2}">
				<tween:Wait duration="1050"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="950">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}" scaleY="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{img1}">
				<tween:Wait duration="2050"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="950">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}" scaleY="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{start}">
				<tween:Wait duration="3050"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="950">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}" scaleY="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image id="image" source="3@2x_png" anchorOffsetX="125" anchorOffsetY="60" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img2" width="250" height="120" y="60" source="2@2x_png" rotation="359.51" anchorOffsetX="125" anchorOffsetY="60" scaleY="0" scaleX="0" x="125"/>
	<e:Image id="img1" width="250" height="120" y="60" source="1@2x_png" anchorOffsetX="125" anchorOffsetY="60" scaleX="0" scaleY="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="start" width="250" height="120" y="60" source="start@2x_png" anchorOffsetX="125" anchorOffsetY="60" scaleX="0" scaleY="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="pauseBtn" width="54" height="77" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button label="Button" x="98" y="61"/>
	<e:Image source="zanting@2x_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="pumpBtnClick" width="750" height="159" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button label="" width="750"> 
        <e:Skin states="up,over,down,disabled"> 
            <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_dianji@2x_png"/>
        </e:Skin> 
    </e:Button> 
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="pumpBtnDefault" width="750" height="159" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button label="" width="750"> 
        <e:Skin states="up,over,down,disabled"> 
            <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_normal@2x_png"/>
        </e:Skin> 
    </e:Button> 
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="readyBtnEnd" width="269" height="116" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Button label="Button" x="98" y="61"/>
	<e:Image source="zhunbei_gray@2x_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="readyBtnStart" width="269" height="116" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Button label="Button" x="98" y="61"/>
	<e:Image source="ready-@2x_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameContainerSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg@2x_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Rect id="pauseMask" width="0" height="1334" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="0.5" strokeAlpha="1"/>
	<e:Button id="continueBtn" label="" verticalCenter="0" x="250" alpha="1" visible="false">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="jixu@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="homeBtn" label="" verticalCenter="0" x="400" alpha="1" visible="false">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="shouye@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="resetBtn" label="" x="250" verticalCenter="0" alpha="1" visible="false">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="restart@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="pumpBtn" label="Button" enabled="true" skinName="pumpBtnDefault" width="750" x="-1" y="1176">
    </e:Button>
	<e:Button id="pauseBtn" width="54" height="77" x="40" enabled="true" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="zanting@2x_png" source.down="zanting@2x_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
    <e:Button id="readyBtn" label="" enabled="true" horizontalCenter="3.5" y="868" width="269" height="116">
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="countDownAnime" label="" enabled="true" horizontalCenter="3.5" y="725" width="269" height="116">
	</e:Button>
    <e:Image id="gamelose" source="shu@2x_png" horizontalCenter="0" y="783" alpha="1" visible="false"/>
    <e:Image id="gamewin" source="ying@2x_png" horizontalCenter="0" y="783" alpha="1"  visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>
